attributes.action: Exempt pensioners from income tax and council tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is time to do something positive for the pensioners, they have suffered from years of neglect by successive governments.  

Remove complicated means testing and make all senior citizens, who are in receipt of the state pension, exempt from income tax and council tax.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
